author: germuska
msg: Tighten expectation that all Struts commands will be used with a chain Context class which implements ActionContext.  Explicitly use ActionContext in abstract method signatures to eliminate repetitive casting.  (Would it be worth making all Struts commands extend a simple abstract ActionContextCommand which delegated execute(Context) to an execute(ActionContext) method?)

author: germuska
msg: Add 'exception' property to ActionContext and ActionContextBase.
